page.title: 05Mobile Services, Cannington
page.content: In Cannington there are seven mobile services .They are a mobile library,fish and chip van,fresh fish (shrimps and prawns) van,ice cream van, meat van, bread and cake van, and fruit and vegetable ( sweets and crisps etc) van. These are the days that they come.The mobile library comes once every fortnight on a Wednesday .The fish and chip van comes several days a week.The fresh fish van comes round every night. The meat van comes round Tuesday and Friday afternoons. The fruit and vegetable van comes Tuesday and Thursday mornings.
